title: Did Belusi approve a bill that would allow her husband to make millions sell United States property?
subtitle: It appears that the mima on Facebook is a rewording of another version of 2013.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belosi, approved a bill that would help her husband profit from the federally owned sale of the United States. :: Postal service property.
